<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Shadowbound Monk Statue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2095)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 56</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** -1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 (24 when broken, construct armor)

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, the statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once the statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, and its Armor Class is reduced to 24.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stone fist +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+8 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
darkness mote +14 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 4d8 negative

**Clinging Gloom  The statue pulls a creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) into its grasping shadows. The target takes 3d8 negative damage and 1d8 [persistent negative damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Cowl of Shadow**   Shifting shadows cover the statue. If the statue is dealt at least 15 positive damage or brought within an area of magical light, the shadows recede, and the statue can't make darkness mote attacks or use Clinging Gloom.

</column>
